verses.name: 2 Kings 5:24
verses.text: And when he came to the tower, he took them from their hand, and bestowed them in the house: and he let the men go, and they departed.

verses.name: 2 Kings 5:25
verses.text: But he went in, and stood before his master. And Elisha said unto him, Whence comest thou, Gehazi? And he said, Thy servant went no whither.

verses.name: 2 Kings 5:26
verses.text: And he said unto him, Went not mine heart with thee, when the man turned again from his chariot to meet thee? Is it a time to receive money, and to receive garments, and oliveyards, and vineyards, and sheep, and oxen, and menservants, and maidservants?
